physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Inability to tolerate iron due to constipation reported.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal colonoscopy results; biopsy showed villous shortening and increased intraepithelial lymphocytes consistent with celiac disease.
Diagnosis of celiac disease made from duodenal biopsy results.
Patient reports weight loss (15 pounds), improved iron levels, and reduction in joint pain since starting gluten-free diet.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Joint pain improved, overall health reported as better.
